query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO form_layout (CRF_ID, STATUS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED, REVISION_NOTES, OC_OID, XFORM) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE form_layout SET CRF_ID=?,STATUS_ID=?,NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=?,DATE_UPDATED=NOW(),UPDATE_ID=?,REVISION_NOTES =? WHERE form_layout_ID=?

query.name: findItemFromMap
query.sql: select v.item_id, i.name,i.owner_id from versioning_map v, item i where v.item_id =i.item_id and v.form_layout_id=?

query.name: isItemUsedByOtherVersion
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT v1.item_id FROM versioning_map v1, versioning_map v2 WHERE v1.item_id = v2.item_id AND v1.form_layout_id != v2.form_layout_id AND v1.form_layout_id = ?

query.name: findNotSharedItemsByVersion
query.sql: select v.item_id,i.name,i.owner_id from versioning_map v, item i where v.item_id =i.item_id and v.form_layout_id=? and v.item_id not in (SELECT DISTINCT v.item_id FROM versioning_map v WHERE v.form_layout_id != ? )
